name: Lava Joe
description:
This is my entry for Toy Box Jam 2019 where all art, sound effect and music where supplied.

Keep climbing to avoid the rising lava. Collect treasure and take down monsters for bonus points.

Controls

  • Arrows: Move
  • Z: Shoot
  • X: Jump

Credits

  • Sprites and sound effects by ThatTomHall and LaFolie
  • Ninjoe character and animation by Toby Hefflin
  • Music by Gruber
